bibl.title: Ceramics from Ismant el-Kharab.
Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons
bibl.author: DUNSMORE, Amanda

bibl.note: Five specific groups: four pre-fourth century in date and one forurth-century assemblage.
DUNSMORE Amanda, Ceramics from Ismant el-Kharab.

Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002) pp. 129-142, nombr. profils.
